keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: As conflict rages elsewhere in Libya, a precarious order holds in the capital, as heavily armed militias and politicians, nominally allied, vie for control.

headline.print_headline: Veneer of Calm Fools No One in Libyan Capital
headline.main: Tripoli, a Tense and Listless City With Gunmen and a Well-Stocked Hugo Boss Outlet

snippet: As conflict rages elsewhere in Libya, a precarious order holds in the capital, as heavily armed militias and politicians, nominally allied, vie for control.
abstract: Tenuous and tense calm reigns in Libya's capital, Tripoli, as war rages around country, replete with lurking smugglers, heavily armed militias and arguing politicians maneuvering for control; traffic is bustling, yet crime is rife, Westerners are scarce, and billions of dollars of halted construction projects haunt city.
